授業方法:
【オンライン受講生対象】
オンラインでの受講を許可された学生に対しては、音声／映像付きオンデマンドコンテンツの配信で対応します。LUNAに資料を掲載しています。
(Information for students permitted to take classes online)
On-demand materials of the classes will be shared through LUNA.

Lectures, discussions and student presentations. We conduct classes face to face
.

第3回:
Agency Problems and Agency Costs
Role of Main Bank
第4回: Financial Institutions in Japanese Financial Market
第5回: Reading the article of Public Finance.
第6回: Reading the article of Policy Impact.
第7回: Reading the article of Market Tops and Bottoms.
第8回: Reading the article of Japanese Corporate Finance.
第10回: Reading the article of Japanese Business Practice.
第11回: Reading the article of Corporate Japan.
第12回: Reading the article of Nireco: Poison Pill.
第13回: Reading the article of Livedoor: Takeover Attempt.
第14回:
INA Foods: Keeping the company private
Student Presentation
Reading the article of INA Foods:  Keeping the company private.
トピック.授業外学習2: The student is expected to prepare for classes by completing the reading assignments and reading daily newspapers related to finance, investment and Japanese business.

評価.学生による授業評価の方法Course Evaluation by Student: Will be conducted at the end of the course.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
評価.成績評価Grading3:
備考　Note
Presentations 30%
Attendance and Participation 20%
Final Report Examination 50%
